post.body: haven't seen yours but I'm pretty sure mine is hanging out with yours. Stupid sanity. Alway running off.
Lisa's just too popular of a name though! Working on getting that and my last name though (inactive Twitter acct).
ROFL! I love it - "came out ..." like sharing your name is bad? Totally understand. Would love to change name here.
Congrats and awesome job! That was a great read :) When I clicked over, I was like "Who's Lori?" LOL! Thought ur name was Laurel!
Yeah! I'm coming :D Rooming with @DawnMHSH - she needed a roomie and I decided to jump in :)
Ack! I forgot you're going to #blissdom09 - so am I :) Meet you there!
There is no directory or place to register hashtags - Google'd your ? and found a Twitter Group.
Modern Mom Challenge (@karpo is this you?) http://twittgroups.com/group/mmchallenge
Can you logout of Twitter in your phone application? There should be a way to change the password there.
TweetDeck may be using Search for Replies. Would those numbers make sense? I have the notification window off :(
You weren't gonna tell us you were nominated were you? :)
Depends on where it pops up? If in the notification window, it's letting you know there's # of tweets in the search column?
Lots of our friends (and you) over there :D They are missing some categories like Best Mom Blog :D
Love the new look :) and have always loved your blog name (Seek First His Kingdom).
That's awesome news!!
Do you do just blogging in one place now? Personal, business, tutorials?
very interesting :) Was considering doing a separate site for WP stuff, but maybe I should do one - trying to keep personal sep.
Oh, and my name is all over the place - or some form of Lisa B. But family doesn't want daughter's name out there (stalkers).
Oh! and vote for Chatting at the Sky too!! http://tinyurl.com/a4thd7 @skychatter :D
Have you voted for Blog Nosh too? http://tinyurl.com/a3e7ew
